pr_title: Move to container engine neutral names

timeline.message: Move to container engine neutral names

timeline.bodyText: This breaks the API between the config server and config model. You need to keep the old method with a TODO specifying when it can be removed . Unfortunately, since I think we have pinned applications now that should be by version and not just something like "Remove in October 2020".
timeline.author: bratseth

timeline.bodyText: This also breaks that API since all of config-provisioning is an API for the config model, but based on current usage this one is probably ok.
timeline.author: bratseth

timeline.bodyText: This one also breaks the API but is probably ok.
timeline.author: bratseth

timeline.bodyText: This renaming breaks the API. Not sure you can do it, maybe by duplicating and subtyping?
timeline.author: bratseth
bratseth
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -50,7 +50,7 @@ public HostSpec(String hostname,
                     ClusterMembership membership,
                     Optional<Version> version,
                     Optional<NetworkPorts> networkPorts,
-                    Optional<DockerImage> dockerImageRepo) {

timeline.message: Avoid renaming DockerImage which is used in the config model

timeline.bodyText: MIght as well simplify this to Docker now.
timeline.author: mpolden
mpolden
